disableInstallHelp.title: Disable opening help page on install
disableInstallHelp.description: If set to true, then help page will not be opened on install.

disableBackup.title: Disable 3rd party backup
disableBackup.description: If set to true, then 3rd party backup options will be hidden. If 3rd party backup is already configured for a user this will not stop it.

disableExport.title: Disable import / export menu
disableExport.description: If set to true, then export buttons will be hidden.

storageArea.title: Storage area
storageArea.description: Set to 'sync' or 'local'. If set will force user to use specified storage area. This setting will not check if a user is currently using another storage space and may hide data.

feedbackURL.title: Feedback URL
feedbackURL.description: Change the URL the feedback button opens.

enforcePassword.title: Enforce password
enforcePassword.description: If set to true, then user will be prompted to set a password before adding an account (if none set) and the remove password button will be hidden.

enforceAutolock.title: Enforce autolock
enforceAutolock.description: If any value is set, then the user will not be able to change the autolock setting. Set to a number in minutes.

passwordPolicy.title: Password policy
passwordPolicy.description: A regular expression to test if the password meets the security requirements. No slashes are needed (e.g. use [A-Z]+, but not use /[A-Z]+/).

passwordPolicyHint.title: Password policy hint
passwordPolicyHint.description: Hint to show if the password doesn't meet the security requirements.
